mdRecord.dcterms:title: Draft letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to Hannah Farnsworth, ca. 1868
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Incomplete draft letter from Ann Pamela Cunningham to Hannah Farnsworth, Vice Regent for Michigan, ca. 1868. Probably in writing of S.W. Tiffey, secretary. Partial copy, incomplete. Explains current situation with Miss Tracy who is living at the Mansion for the time being although resigned from her duties. Afraid she was wrong about Miss Tracy who may have also been irresponsible with finances. Feels Mr. Riggs is upset with her over Miss Tracy's departure but doesn't really understand why.
